# About Me

üë®‚Äçüî¨ **Kamal Chhetri**

Welcome to my GitHub site !

By this time, you know me a lot. I am Kamal Chhetri doing my PhD in Virginia Tech. I have completed my MS in Biotechnology (Plant breeding) from West Virginia State University and Bachelor of Science in Agriculture (BSC.AG) from Lamjung campus, Tribhuvan University, Nepal.

My research interests are in **plant breeding, host pathogen interactions, genomics, and the integration of machine learning** in crop improvement. As a graudate research assitant at Virgina Tech, I am conducting¬†research on

-   Fungicide¬†efficacy evaluations and corn hybrid succeptibility evaluation.

-   Early pathogen detection using high throughput metagenomics sequencing apporach, and decision support system tools.

My work centers on integrating bioinformatics, statistical analysis, and machine learning to develop decision‚Äësupport tools that improve agricultural disease management. If you‚Äôd like to explore my research and learn more about me, you can find everything through the quick link below.
